nodes.bodyText:
It is not mandatory to check if DynatraceServiceInfo exists before registering JmxMeterRegistry.
However, it we check that we can optimize the things as not registering the registry at all.
In this way we will avoid unecesarry preparation of our own metrics and send them to micrometer
This should no longer be needed, right?
DynatraceMeterRegistry  is removed. ReactorNetty use directly Metrics.globalRegistry that propagates meters in all registered registries.
